name: ParaMania
description:
WARNING: This game contains flashes of light and lasers. If you have epilepsy, do not play this game. If you feel sick at any point playing the game, stop immediately and seek medical help. 

CONTROLS:

Ghost: WASD to move camera, click on furniture or ghostbuster to possess.  

Furniture/Ghostbuster: WASD to move. Z to go back to ghost form. 

ENEMIES:

Ghostbuster: Shoots a laser that slows you down while in furniture form.  

Investigator: Snaps a picture of you that blinds the screen for a period of time. 

Salt: Decreases health while in ghost form. 

OBJECTIVE:

Switching between ghost and furniture form, put as much furniture "out of place" as possible before time runs out. Avoid enemies and salt. Enjoy the story!
